review: I have an older Roku that I love... so when I ordered this, I'll admit I had high expectations. I expected this to... at the very least... work. It doesn't. Netflix is stuck on the same screen all of the time. I cannot browse or play anything. I cannot access my HBO go account. I am able to get on to Amazon, but the streaming freezes every thirty seconds. My internet speed is more than sufficient to accommodate streaming. To top it off: the remote sticks. So in the rare instance that I'm able to access an app, the remote speeds past any options I could possibly make.It's going in the trash.

review: We just received this about a week ago and there has been a problem with the remote since the day we got it.  It seems like the batteries don't sit right in it.  Almost every time we use it we have to take the batteries out and put them back in for the remote to work (of course we put in new batteries).  Then it will work for a little while and then it will stop working until we fuss with the batteries again.  We actually put some thought/research into whether we were going to buy this or its competitor and, well, it didn't take long to learn we picked the wrong one.
